title: Science Education Design and Feedback Strategies Utilizing Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI)

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Most Learners Are Prospective Elementary Teachers or Job Seekers in Related Fields, Highly Interested in Practical Tools Applicable to Science Education Settings

learning_goals: Learners generate three or more science education design frameworks using generative AI tools (LLMs)
Learners critically analyze and improve GenAI-based feedback according to evaluation criteria
Learners propose five or more ethical usage principles for GenAI in science education content development
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
